vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σερούχ (Rec. Σαρ-), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. שְׂרוּג),
Serug: Luk.3:35.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.20;
son of: Reu (H7466);
father of: Nahor (H5152)
§ Serug
Serug, "descendant, i.e., younger branch"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西鹿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "交纏的"
1) 基督家譜中, 拉吳的兒子 (路 3:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西鹿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "交缠的"
1) 基督家谱中, 拉吴的儿子 (路 3:35)
